text:
@senatemajldr Intetesting. Americans need help now?
Are you still there trying to work out a deal?
Please tell us how the following helps Americans deal with #COVID19 :
$2B for F-35s
$1.7B for FBI building
$1B for surveillance planes
$375M for armored vehicles
$360M for missile defense
